projects.title: Kanban Board
projects.text: Ecommerce or electronic commerce is the trading of goods and services on the internet. It is your bustling city center or brick-and-mortar shop translated into zeroes and ones on the internet superhighway.

projects.title: Game
projects.text: GAME.co.uk is the UK's leading games retailer with great deals on video games, consoles, accessories and the latest pre-order games.
